title: Elegant Emerald and Diamond Haaram with South Sea Pearl Drops
materials: Natural South Sea Pearls. Hyderabadi Polish for lasting shine.
features: This exquisite Haaram features a delicate floral design encrusted with sparkling diamonds. Emeralds are strategically placed to add a touch of regal charm. The centerpiece pendant, a cascading marvel of diamonds and a larger emerald, is finished with lustrous South Sea pearls. The fine craftsmanship ensures a comfortable drape and secure fit.
occasions: or any special occasion where you want to make a statement. Also suitable for modern formal events.
description: A timeless masterpiece that blends traditional South Indian aesthetics with contemporary design. The combination of diamonds, emeralds, and South Sea pearls exudes luxury and sophistication. Crafted with meticulous attention to detail and using only the finest materials, this Haaram is a true investment that will be treasured for generations. The use of emeralds makes it highly auspicious.
